Params: {1: 'Inver-Collapse', 2: 'Chapter 7', 3: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Atlas/CommonLogo/BgLogo1.png'}
{1: 'ThemeEnable'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory26.jpg'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 3: '3'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Bianca', 3: "I think we need an evaluation of the current status, but that's not something I can decide.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Chrome', 3: "Give me some time, I'll handle the talking.", 4: '3'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Chrome, the one he needs the most right now is you.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Chrome', 3: 'I understand, but I have more important things to handle.', 4: '3'}
{2: 'Chrome', 3: 'It\'s about Kamui and "Tenebrion"—I have to report to the council.', 4: '3'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Karenina', 3: 'Bianca, our mission is to clean up any corrupted and defected Constructs!', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Chrome', 3: 'Kamui did not betray us!', 4: '3'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: "Those are only your words! He's already corrupted by the virus, it's an insurmountable fact!", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: "I don't have time to waste down here!", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Chrome', 3: "Kamui already has a solution. He hasn't shown signs of corruption, and has kept his rationality and consciousness intact. No signs of aggression were displayed as well.", 4: '3'}
{2: 'Chrome', 3: 'As the leader of the Strike Hawk squad, I choose to believe him.', 4: '3'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: "Bianca, if we keep dawdling, the other target's gonna be lost!", 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Bianca', 3: 'You have until we catch up to him, Chrome.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Karenina', 3: 'We only have to follow the mission instructions, Bianca. This is asking for trouble.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: 'We might be disciplined for this!', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 4: '3'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Bianca', 3: "I know, that's why I'm not fully giving him the pass... But as a leader, I know I'd do the same thing as Chrome.", 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 3: '3'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Chrome', 3: 'Thank you, Bianca.', 4: '3'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 4: '3'}
{2: 'Bianca', 3: "According to the geo signals, Kamui went far into the desert. We don't have much time, Karenina. Let's go.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: 'The Purifying Force has geo info of all Constructs?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Bianca', 3: 'I understand your opinions on the Purifying Force—I know we\'re called "hyenas who hunt their own" behind our back. But we never touch Constructs who do not pose a threat.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Bianca', 3: 'And, we do not normally have the authority to access locational signal data. Though it would make our missions a lot easier if we did.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Bianca', 3: 'Only in absolute necessity are we allowed access to such data.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Bianca', 3: "No time to waste. I'll take full responsibility for Kamui's case. Gray Raven squad, you may leave now.", 4: '1'}
{2: "No, we're coming with you.", 3: '52'}
{2: 'Kamui is our friend.', 3: '56'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Indeed. I worry for Kamui as well.', 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: 'The guy might be an annoying airhead, but his absence is all the more audible.', 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: 'And in the mission against "Tifa", Kamui helped us out a lot as well. This is our turn to repay him.', 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Karenina', 3: "Hey Gray Ravens, don't create extra work for us!", 4: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 3: '3'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Chrome', 3: "Gray Ravens, I'll ask for your cooperation as well.", 4: '3'}
{2: 'Bianca', 3: "You don't need to do this. I've already made a reasonable compromise. I will keep my end of the promise.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Chrome', 3: "No, it's not that I don't trust you. But considering the part about the unknown energy, support in the scale of the Gray Raven squad is necessary.", 4: '3'}
{2: 'Bianca', 3: "Very well. We don't have the time for a debate anyway. Follow us if you're coming.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Bianca', 3: "Karenina, let's go.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 4: '3'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Karenina', 3: 'Wait, Bianca, you...!', 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: "Let's follow, then.", 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: 'Commandant, we have a sufficient supply of serums now. It should be enough for the road ahead.', 4: '2'}
{2: "Let's go then!", 3: '88'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 3: '3'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Chrome', 3: "All in all. I'll be counting on you.", 4: '3'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 4: '3'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory31.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Bianca', 3: 'This looks like some sort of concentration zone for a certain kind of building.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Bianca', 3: 'There will likely be scavengers wandering around here.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Bianca', 3: 'If possible, we can give them a heads up. Just in case they might cause trouble for our mission.', 4: '1'}
